comments:
Get a summarized version of the given text.

The output summary will consist of the most representative sentences and will be returned as a string, divided by newlines.

Note ---- The input should be a string, and must be longer than :const:`~gensim.summarization.summarizer.INPUT_MIN_LENGTH` sentences for the summary to make sense. The text will be split into sentences using the split_sentences method in the :mod:`gensim.summarization.texcleaner` module. Note that newlines divide sentences.

 Parameters ---------- text : str Given text. ratio : float, optional Number between 0 and 1 that determines the proportion of the number of sentences of the original text to be chosen for the summary. word_count : int or None, optional Determines how many words will the output contain. If both parameters are provided, the ratio will be ignored. split : bool, optional If True, list of sentences will be returned. Otherwise joined strings will bwe returned.
##### Returns
